properties.areaDesc: Cleburne, AR; Lonoke, AR; Independence, AR; White, AR; Faulkner, AR; Saline, AR; Jackson, AR; Pulaski, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 3:03AM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Independence County in north central Arkansas...
Southwestern Jackson County in eastern Arkansas...
Western Lonoke County in central Arkansas...
Cleburne County in north central Arkansas...
Eastern Faulkner County in central Arkansas...
White County in central Arkansas...
Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas...
Pulaski County in central Arkansas...

* Until 600 AM CST.

* At 258 AM CST, while torrential downpours have ended, areas of
light to moderate rain will continue this morning in the warned
area. Some roads remained flooded from Batesville southwest to the
Little Rock area where more than two inches of rain occurred in
places. It will take awhile for high water to runoff.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Little Rock...                    North Little Rock...
Benton...                         Sherwood...
Jacksonville...                   Cabot...
Searcy...                         West Little Rock...
Maumelle...                       Bryant...
Batesville...                     Downtown Little Rock...
Heber Springs...                  Lonoke...
North Little Rock Airport...      Little Rock AFB...
Southwest Little Rock...          Beebe...
Ward...                           Haskell...
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles. Always heed the advice of local
officials...your life may depend on it!
